div.p: Coded data, consists of a coded value (CV) and, optionally, coded value(s) from other coding systems that identify the same concept. Used when alternative codes may exist.

title.value: ADHA extension code: CodedWithEquivalents (V3 Data Type)

description.value:
**Australian adaptation of the HL7 International CDA CE datatype**.
Coded data that consists of a coded value (CV) and, optionally, coded value(s) from other coding systems that identify the same concept. Used when alternative codes may exist.

short.value: ADHA CDA extension to represent code

definition.value: Coded data, consists of a coded value (CV) and, optionally, coded value(s) from other coding systems that identify the same concept. Used when alternative codes may exist.
Specifies additional codes that increase the specificity of the the primary code.
